chunks.chunk_text: Oh?That's great.So he can do his own shopping.But in the West, the idea is for guys, it's very easy to buy Polo shirts.And when you go buy Polo shirts, you think about Ralph Lauren.So they've got a very, very strong brand association in that regard.For gents like myself, if you want to buy a Polo shirt,

chunks.chunk_text: Lauren?I don't know.Linco outlet.Linco.First thing come to mind in Taiwan, we say Linco outlet, right?Ladies, go to Bali.Bali?Yeah.They have factory shops.Really?In Indonesia.Oh.If you go to Bali Island, you can access their factory shop, Polo Ralph Lauren.No kidding.Oh.Yes.So they sell all your standard Polo shirts and cargo pants.There you have it.You buy from their factory shop.Cool.

chunks.chunk_text: It's very cheap.I wouldn't say very cheap, but it's definitely very close to half off.Although you won't get a lot of options, you won't get the full catalog, but whatever is manufactured in Indonesia will be available at the factory shop.That sounds nice.Yeah, yeah, yeah, you can buy some classic styling.And guess how I knew, because I went.I went and bought me some.Yay.Did you buy a lot at that time?I wouldn't say a lot.

chunks.chunk_text: Because you know, guys, we only need three or four Polo shirts depending on your size.So I mean, I did get, I think it was three or four Polo shirts, different colors.And that would last me for maybe five, six years at least in my wardrobe.So it's your go-to clothes for guys.If you don't know what to wear, Polo shirts are the easiest.They're very simple and you don't need a lot of fashion sense for it, if you catch my drift.So ladies, let's move on to talk about this whole retail.

chunks.chunk_text: We had the best record-breaking revenue this year.So record-breaking revenue versus returns.What kind of situation is this?You guys think, especially on e-commerce, can we do

chunks.chunk_text: returns that easy on e-commerce?Keria?Basically, it depends on every platform that have their own rule for returning.But yes, before we talk about Ralph Laurence, I think most of the listeners may understand what's W11 or Singledates is one of the biggest online promotion campaigns.Start from China, but now Taiwan also, most of the e-commerce platform or many brands will do

chunks.chunk_text: W11.And the customers are looking forward to get the cheapest items during that promotion since the Black Friday is not so popular in Taiwan and I think not so popular in Asia maybe.It's more popular in Europe or United States.So the W11, it's like customers are expecting you can get something valuable for money.You can use the low price to get good quality things.But

chunks.chunk_text: in Taiwan, the situation is a little bit different since we will have the promotions, but we will set some rule like, for example, you can buy more than one thousand and you can get one hundred cash back, something like that.But if you return and all the goods you purchase is not over one thousand, then you cannot get this offer.But in China, it's different like their big e-commerce

chunks.chunk_text: platform, maybe their rule is you can return without any rules.So it's a benefit for the customers.But on the other hand, you sometimes you will always have some tricky or you might say they are smart, but they will think some way and they share on social media like how you can purchase the most things with the lowest cost.

chunks.chunk_text: Yeah, you can call it smart or tricky or whatever, just from different perspective.But it's ended up like we saw a news that Ralph Lawrence get over 90% returning things.People find a way.For example, it's purchase over five thousand, you can get five hundred offers and ended up you return four thousand.

chunks.chunk_text: Five hundred and you only keep the five hundred goods, but they need to get your refund, something like that.So it's damaged the whole sales for this promotion.Sounds very terrible.So Lydia, this sounds like we are not very smart shoppers, are we?Do you ever return anything at all when you buy online?

chunks.chunk_text: The whole process, it's so complicated and I don't feeling like I want to deal with it.So I just give up.Same here.I have the same problem.I don't return or refund anything from e-commerce because it's such a slip.So much trouble and you got to go through hoops like you got to return with the right box and the package cannot be broken.You cannot tear the package up and so on and so forth.There are so many rules that

chunks.chunk_text: say,OK, well, shame on me.It was a mistake.So I don't know what's going on in China, but it sounds like, well, they made it too easy for people to return and refund to me.This was my first impression.Yeah, I think like from the news, I see it is because they have seven days refund policy.You can like refund things without any reason within seven days.Without reason.Yeah, I think so.Without reason.That's what I saw on the news.

chunks.chunk_text: smart shopper and know how to get the best deal for them.So even though like John and me or maybe Korea, we don't really do return.But some people does and some people like really trying to understand how they can get the best value and just spend little amount of money because I was also responsible for the e-commerce platform.And I also have a similar experience

chunks.chunk_text: two percent?Yeah, I think we often see some news saying that, oh, which brand they probably mark the wrong price on their e-commerce.So, you know, like when you see, let's say a MacBook Pro, if it's like two thousand USD and now they only price two hundred, you must understand that that's a mistake.But still, I will see many people online, they were trying to see

chunks.chunk_text: if they order it, will the brand still ship the item for them?If the brand didn't give them product, they will try to ask, I don't know, like discount or something.I mean, this news, we hear a lot.So, yeah.Yes, every now and then.I mean, I would also want to order one and see if I can get a MacBook Pro or any Mac at two hundred dollars, which was previously priced two thousand.

chunks.chunk_text: So, as a shopper, whatever you do on your e-commerce website, your policies, it's meant to be broken.It's meant to be taken advantage of, all right?That's how I shop.If you market two hundred, I will place three orders, six orders, ten orders, I'll buy ten.So, that's how shoppers think.But we all know the rational shopper would say, oh, this is marked wrong.I don't want to go through the trouble fighting with Apple and demanding that they ship the product.

chunks.chunk_text: You cannot always do the promotions without any profit, right?It's like finally your business will close since you cannot earn money.Actually, every promotion will have its purpose.So, yeah, if you only look at the single campaign, it will depend on what's your purpose behind this promotion.Like, if you want to, for example, if you have one item, it's overstock.You have too many stocks and it's

chunks.chunk_text: going to impact your overall storage.So, maybe you will choose like during the W-11, all the people are looking for a cheap price item.So, you decided to, we can set up for this overstock item, ninety percent off.But the purpose is not for I want to earn money because I want to just quickly to sell all of these stocks, then I can have a new product.But for the long-term, you need to think about

chunks.chunk_text: profit actually.At the end of the day, you can only promote and sell at a loss or sell at deep discounts for a while.You cannot do that consistently year in, year out.And it really depends, like you said, depends on your inventory.How much stock are you carrying?If you're carrying too much stock, of course, you are going to slash prices left, right and center.Just to give Lydian Carrier an idea, this year, apparently the gross merchandise volume for Singles Day

chunks.chunk_text: this is according to this article.They've generated in gross merchandise volume, they generated 16 billion renminbi.It's quite a big number.So, even with high return rates or high refund rates, whatever, all these different rates that come with, can we call it a side effect of high sales, right?16 billion.I mean, as long as they can keep it within, there must be a healthy figure of return rates and

chunks.chunk_text: refund rates.If it's around two to five percent, I still think 16 billion, two to five percent, many, many companies can still handle this.But the revenue, 16 billion, that's what we're after.If you start making money, you have cash flow and you can keep the business running and you can at least get rid of some stock.Yes.So, these are some of the business metrics that we all have to think about.Sometimes we get a good deal from the shopper's end and we got to know actually you're buying

chunks.chunk_text: the old stock that looks new, two-year-old polo shirts.Sometimes for a guy like me, I don't really care if the polo shirts are newly designed or follow some sort of fashion trend.If they look decent and if I like the colors, I will buy it, irregardless of fashion.I think it depends on the categories.For example, clothing, if it's a classic design,

chunks.chunk_text: shirt is a polo shirt is a polo shirt.A cargo pants is cargo pants is cargo pants.But for you ladies, when it comes to fashion, it's very different.It's seasonal.For gents, I don't know it.I don't feel so seasonal when it comes to my wardrobe.So, Lydia, have you purchased any interesting fashion goods lately?Double 11 or December?No, not this year.I'm trying to find something to purchase and I even asked my friend, what should I buy this year?But at the end, I didn't buy anything.I'm also very surprised.

chunks.chunk_text: So, an iPhone, with that, I think you asked a great question.Do we consider iPhone like a, I don't know, something you would buy only on double 11 or would that be just a regular thing every two years?For me, it's more regular because I actually trade my old phone in for the new phone every two years when my mobile contract expires.So, when I renew my contract, this is what I do.Every two years, I get a new phone and I trade my old phone in.So, to me, it's not a fashion item per se.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: But it's sort of a routine thing.I go with the contract.Okay.Yes, I remember John is an Apple big fan, Apple VIP.For me, it's also not a fashion thing.I think the mobile phone is for a very practical purpose too.I need to use it.And since before I changed this phone, my last iPhone was iPhone X.So, that means that I already used that for six years.

chunks.chunk_text: It can prove that I didn't broke it on purpose.And I need to say that actually purchase an iPhone during double 11 campaign, you cannot get a very big discount.It's maybe only 5% off.Regular discount.Yeah.But for me, it's like I truly need a new phone and 5% discount is better than nothing.Yeah.So, that's why.

chunks.chunk_text: I purchased it during double 11.And ladies, it's so interesting why iPhone can always keep its discounts that low, right?5% that's most you get.If you get any better discount, you probably have to buy all sorts of other things.You have to buy a phone case.You have to buy a charger.You have to buy all sorts of other things to get more discount.But the phone generally now, I think on the market, we can see only a 5% discount if you do get any discount.But with fashion and all the
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: other sort of popular double 11 goods, they go half off, 40% off, 30% off at least.And it's just crazy, right?I don't know how Apple does it.And they do it so well in terms of brand and marketing that if they offer 5% and you are okay with 5%.But when we buy polo shirts, if they don't do half off, I don't buy.So, these product categories and the way we see discounts
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: are very, very different and the way we perceive them.I don't know if you ladies have noticed this.Lydia?

chunks.chunk_text: So, I think like what Caria just mentioned earlier in this episode, she was talking about the brand cannot always do the sales because if you're doing discount or
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: promotion too often, then people won't buy when you are just offering the normal price.That's also the strategy that e-commerce people need to think about like when and how to use the discounts to drive the sales.Right.Ladies, let's do a quick summary regarding what exactly happened to Ralph Lauren.And after that, we can talk about some of particular ways that recommend these platforms and brand owners to do, you know, learning
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: from this experience from Ralph Lauren.One of the key ideas from Ralph Lauren's situation this time around in W11 sales is that the sales numbers appear impressive at first glance and they reached 16 billion RMB in gross merchandise volume GMV.But the high return rate had a very different pictures.Consumer added the brand's 1,900 RMB sweaters or 270 RMB socks to qualify
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: to discounts only to cancel or return the purchase after securing their savings and discounts.So, this is one of the loopholes they've taken on with the Ralph Lauren platforms in China this time around.And also, platforms like Shaohongshu, influencers and everyday shoppers share these guides on how to maximize savings during W11.So, it hit Ralph Lauren extremely bad because people went on and said
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: do this from Ralph Lauren.You're going to save a lot.So, Lydia, these two takeaways now, what do you think is the key policy that people took advantage of?I think what happened here at W11, they offer the cross store for deduction.So, which means people can spend certain amount of money across different store and get a discount.So, for people, it sounds a good deal.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: So, what happened on Ralph Lauren is people don't really want to buy Ralph Lauren at that time.So, they just add 1,900 RMB sweater to the car to quickly reach the discount amount and then they use the discount to buy other things they really want.After they got the item, they just returned the Ralph Lauren sweater and that was terrible.If we get really technical here, people took advantage of
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: this one policy.That's not the, well, two or three policies, but these two policies go together.First, these platforms have seven day no return policy, right?And then also, at the same time, this time around for W11, there's this full cross store, full reduction, which means you can buy certain things from Ralph Lauren, put it in your shopping cart and then you can go to other brands that you are looking for.So, everything on this e-commerce platform, there's a cross store, full reduction.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: As long as you reach a certain purchase amount, you can get certain discounts.But what shoppers do is they reach that amount and return Ralph Lauren and keep whatever is left.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: For example, if you return the item, then you are not able to enjoy the discount.The product you buy, you need to pay the original price because you didn't reach a certain amount for the discount.That's the one thing.Second thing is I am guessing because they can do no reason refund.It's because they have too many transactions, so they are not able to check every single
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: transaction by person.So, they probably do it, you know, like automatically.If there's nothing wrong, then I will refund or return the money to you.But as what I understand, Amazon also using similar strategy, but they are based on your credit to see whether this refund need to check by real person.So, if you do have a good credit in the past, then
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: they can return the money to you very quick without check.But if you have a bad credit, you often return the thing, always report you didn't receive the item, then they will probably ask someone to check your refund request very carefully.So, I think these two things may be something we can think about.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: We know platforms drive revenue and brand owners want profitability.So, what can we do here to balance and make sure people still shop and they reduce a lot of this redundancy in returns and refunds?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: So, you need to be aware of this kind of situation.Like John mentioned, there are so many influencers before the W11.They already share some skills and some tips to smart shopping.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: They use the return policies to get the very high quality, the high cost things, but only use a little price.So, I just think about one aggressive ideas that may be for this kind of luxury brand.If they don't do double 11 promotion, for example, your brand, your items, you don't want to do this kind of promotions to hurt it and to impact
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: your overall brand identities.I'm not saying you are stop your shop on that kind of days, but maybe you can think about to not review some low-profit products during this period.You just keep some low-price, high-profit items on your online shop at least promotion period.Also, another way to do.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: You change the catalog a little bit and that sort of offsets the problematic refunds and returns and that way you still maintain profitability.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: Don't follow this.At least the brand owners must be smart about it.If you see some of these platforms being overly aggressive, giving these deep discounts, coupons, cash rebates, whatever, then you got to really be careful.You got to really monitor this and also today, I think for you marketers, Caria and Lydia, you guys have to be very, very aware of the smart shoppers on social media because those things go viral.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: They go on TikTok and people teach one another how to get best deals and they grow like wildfire and it might hurt your campaign in the end, no matter how smart of a marketer you are.Social media today has a great influence and influences too has a great influence on what we do in these e-commerce platforms.So ladies, before we wrap up this episode, can we have a prediction?Do you think something like this will happen in Taiwan?Let's go with Lydia.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: I think it always happens.So that's why the buying and return policy will become longer and longer.So I will say it will keep happening and then shopper will become smarter and like seller will be also smarter by education.So I will say it will still happen.So like we as people who running e-commerce, we need to be more careful when we planning the promotion or like
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: double eleven event.And I also think the reason the Ralph Lauren news become that famous during this season is also because almost everyone know this brand.I was saying it's probably they are not only brand suffer less during double eleven this time, but it just because they are famous.So people will use land to talk about this.That's true because they are major Western
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: brand.And also the GMB is pretty decent.Sixteen billion dreaming B.That's a lot of money.Well, obviously at the end of the article, we saw that Ralph Lauren also a few days after released a statement saying no, that's false.That's just hearsay.You know, who knows?Only Ralph Lauren will know.And Caria, do you think this we have smart shoppers like Lydia's mentioned and we also have smart platforms and smart brand owners.So everybody's sort of in good balance right now.So we don't hear

chunks.chunk_text: a lot about this in Taiwan.For my opinion, I think Taiwan's e-commerce platforms reform.Even though we also have a seven days return, but we will still like it's one of the things that is the customer's behavior is a little bit different.Like average return rate in Taiwan is not quite high.For example, we also have some customers like you and Lydia's you may be too lazy to reform.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: We are smart shoppers, but at the same time we're lazy.You think you need to spend your time to do this, then you rather than keep these items.And on the other hand, we are not talking about like other countries people are more tricky or not.Every country will have some tricky or you call smart shopping customers, but the situation is a little bit different.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: The return rate is higher because people are very, people used to purchase because they need to spend many times to physical stores.That's why they are used to purchase.For example, the clothes they may have SML purchased together, then you feed them and keep the most suitable one for you.But in Taiwan, it's not the same situations.And most of our online shopping
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: brand shop or e-commerce platform still have some rule for the return.Or if you just want to get the discount, but you return it, then you cannot get it.I think most of the campaigns are these kind of situations.So if you didn't purchase over that amount, you cannot get the cash back.You don't have a very big room for those tricky smart shoppers to get benefit of it.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: So that's why not so many people as well working on it to think about how to do this kind of things compared with China situation.I think we are conditioned to not think about tricking the system or taking advantage of the system.We've been well trained in that regard.I'm sure somewhere along the line, there are loopholes in the system.But generally in Taiwan, we don't shop like that because we think it's too much trouble.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: So if you're searching on how to take advantage of a loophole, I'd rather just buy and forget about it and move on and do something else.We may just search the price online and maybe just add it to the wish list and check the price, something like that.And then we purchase it when it has a discount, but maybe we don't want to find a loophole or other things to trick the system.We are very, very decent consumers in Taiwan.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.248_ 電商學英語 - Ralph Lauren雙十一出乎意料的故事 What can we learn from Ralph.json

chunks.chunk_text: We don't take advantage of these things, but actually we do.It's just we are conditioned not to always look for those kind of loopholes because we know it could be a marking mistake.It could be a backend mistake.It could be a whatever mistake.So we've learned the hard way.We've matured.Thank you very much for joining us today, you guys.And big thanks to Lydia and Keria today for joining us even though they are in their peak season.
